message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up too much yet!
You're not giving up enough, I'll meet you in the middle this time!
You're getting more aggressive, I'll try to hold firm, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more!
You're not budging, I'll try to get a better deal, but I'm still willing to compromise!
You're getting desperate, I'll try to squeeze out a better deal, but I'm not giving up control!
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'll try to get a better deal, even if it's just a little!
You're getting close to desperation, I'll try to take control, but I'm willing to give you a small bone!
You're trying to take control, but I'll try to hold out for a better deal, even if it's just a little more!
You're running out of options, I'll try to take the majority, but I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie!
You're trying to take the majority, but I'll hold out for a better deal, even if it's just a little bit!
It's down to the wire, I'll take almost everything, you'll get a tiny fraction, but it's better than nothing!
